label: Belts and Suspenders
description: Fashion accessories worn around the waist or shoulders to hold up clothing or for decorative purposes.
intents: Find a specific brand or style of belt or suspenders
Purchase a belt or suspenders for a specific occasion or outfit
Learn about the latest fashion trends in belts and suspenders

subcategories.label: Designer Belts
subcategories.description: High-end belts from luxury fashion brands.

subcategories.label: Suspenders
subcategories.description: Straps worn over the shoulders to hold up pants or skirts.

subcategories.label: Waist Belts
subcategories.description: Belts worn around the waist for fashion or to cinch clothing.

subcategories.label: Novelty Belts
subcategories.description: Belts with unique or unusual designs.
